Key Match Events: Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal in the 76th minute
Andrej Kramaric scored an equalizer for Croatia in the 74th minute
Klaus Gjasula scored a late equalizer in extra time
Pre-Game Insights: Albania and Croatia both had one point each after their opening matches
Croatia needed to win their last group game to progress
Post-Match Reflections: Albania coach Zlatko Dalic praised the team's resilience
Croatia coach Zlatko Dalic expressed optimism for the match against Italy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of 46,784 fans
The game was one of the first to feature the expanded Euro finals with 24 teams
